entities.name: twelve
entities.description: The number twelve is mentioned as being hardly better than eleven to receive information.

entities.name: eleven
entities.description: The number eleven is compared to twelve in terms of receiving information.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being young and having a night of triumph.

relationships.description: Dumbledore mentions that Voldemort expects people who love to act in a certain way, implying they are enemies.
Dumbledore cared about Harry's happiness and peace of mind more than his plan.
